data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chatzaki, Maria (2018): On the ground spider genera Marjanus gen. n., Lasophorus gen. n. and Turkozelotes Kovblyuk & Seyyar, 2009 (Araneae: Gnaphosidae) from Greece. Zootaxa 4392 (3): 521-545, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4392.3.5|9 occurrences
